Donations Agreement
     By submitting donation to L2 Battle For Power you agree that you are NOT entitled to receive anything from us,                        rewards will be given to those who have donated as a thank you for your continued support.
     This form of donation is completely voluntary and it is used to improve L2 Battle For Power.
     By submitting a donation via Paypal or SMS Donation you agree to the seven terms presented in the
     following statements:
     1.You will not attempt to recall your donation to L2 Battle For Power.
     2.You will not dispute the charges incurred to your Paypal account or SMS donation from your voluntary                       donation to L2 Battle For Power.
     3.You understand that this is a voluntary donation and it is not refundable or disputable at any time or any                 reason.
     4.Any attempt to fraud donation system will lead to permanent removal of your account(s).
     5.Being a donator do not give you any privelege. You will be threat just like any other player.
     6.If reward received in response to a donation or donation(s) was stolen, lost, misplaced, dropped in game, we            will not be held responsible for its recovery.
     7.If you do not agree to these terms, do not send in a donation. By sending a donation, you agreed to this                     Agreement.
